name: A Cat in Dungeons
description:
A Cat in Dungeons is a puzzle game where you need to find the best path to the goal, walking trough turnable tabletops. Each level contains different obstacles and puzzles, including teleports and mechanisms.

Features


  • Turnable Tabletop: don't you know how to escape? Try to turn the tabletop!
  • 50 challenge levels
  • Solve riddles to avoid falling grounds
  • Use teleports
  • Use mechanisms to unlock doors and gates
